entries.name: session1 == session2 → booleanclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns true if the two Session is the same, false if not.

entries.name: time → Timeclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the time at which the session was established.

entries.name: timeout → Integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns the timeout value set for the session, in seconds from the established time.

entries.name: timeout = integerclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Sets how long until the session expires in seconds.

entries.name: to_der → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns an ASN1 encoded String that contains the Session object.

entries.name: to_pem → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Returns a PEM encoded String that contains the Session object.

entries.name: to_text → Stringclick to toggle source
entries.desc: Shows everything in the Session object. This is for diagnostic purposes.
